item.title: What A Long Strange Trip It's Been
item.description: Just over four years ago, I impulsively responded to a Facebook post about a devops evangelism role at a new tech startup. I had never been an evangelist and I knew nothing of the term “devops”. #yolo ¯_(ツ)_/¯ This spontaneous act illuminated a path of personal and professional growth. A path that created new opportunities for me almost daily. A path that changed me for the better. A path that wasn’t there… until it was.

item.title: Deploying a Static HTML Site to Azure with App Services
item.description: What’s a Static HTML Site? … you may be asking yourself. It’s like the hip way to be old school, but in a new-skool kinda way! Nowadays, most websites contain both server-side and client-side (browser) scripts that are actively changing the content and properties of the website. Any e-commerce site is a good example of this. Data is stored and delivered to the server and browser from a variety of sources and served up to the end-user dynamically as they navigate their way through the site.
